.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkBindBufferMemoryDeviceGroupInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_BIND_BUFFER_MEMORY_DEVICE_GROUP_INFO
* [[VUID-VkBindBufferMemoryDeviceGroupInfo-pDeviceIndices-parameter]] If pname:deviceIndexCount is not `0`, pname:pDeviceIndices must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:deviceIndexCount basetype:uint32_t values
****
